0.text: Innate: Talon's abilities apply a stack of Wound to enemy  champions and large  monsters hit for 6 seconds, refreshing on basic attacks and subsequent applications and stacking up to 3 times.
0.html: Innate: Talon's abilities apply a stack of Wound to enemy champions and large monsters hit for 6 seconds, refreshing on basic attacks and subsequent applications and stacking up to 3 times.
markedPassages: champions
monsters

1.text: Talon's next basic attack against an enemy with 3 Wound stacks is empowered to consume them all to cause the target to bleed, dealing「 75 − 255 (based on level) (+ 200% bonus AD) total physical damage over 2 seconds, 」「 4.69 − 15.94 (based on level) (+ 12.5% bonus AD) physical damage every 0.125 seconds over 2 seconds, 」increased to 120% damage against  monsters. The target cannot gain Wound stacks during this time.
1.html: Talon's next basic attack against an enemy with 3 Wound stacks is empowered to consume them all to cause the target to bleed, dealing「 75 − 255 (based on level) (+ 200% bonus AD) total physical damage over 2 seconds, 」「 4.69 − 15.94 (based on level) (+ 12.5% bonus AD) physical damage every 0.125 seconds over 2 seconds, 」increased to 120% damage against monsters. The target cannot gain Wound stacks during this time.

monsters

0.text: Active: Talon  dashes towards the target enemy, dealing physical damage upon arrival. If Noxian Diplomacy is cast within close range, Talon instead stabs the target to  critically strike for (50% +  35%) bonus physical damage, as well as gain  75 bonus attack range on his next basic attack within 1 second.
0.html: Active: Talon dashes towards the target enemy, dealing physical damage upon arrival. If Noxian Diplomacy is cast within close range, Talon instead stabs the target to critically strike for (50% +  35%) bonus physical damage, as well as gain  75 bonus attack range on his next basic attack within 1 second.
markedPassages: dashes
critically strike
(50% +  35%) bonus physical damage
35%
75 bonus attack range

1.text: If Noxian Diplomacy kills the target, Talon  heals for 9 − 55 (based on level) and the ability's  cooldown is reduced by 50%.
1.html: If Noxian Diplomacy kills the target, Talon heals for 9 − 55 (based on level) and the ability's  cooldown is reduced by 50%.
markedPassages: heals
cooldown

2.text: Noxian Diplomacy's stab  resets Talon's basic attack timer.  Shadow Assault can be cast during the dash.
2.html: Noxian Diplomacy's stab resets Talon's basic attack timer. Shadow Assault can be cast during the dash.
markedPassages: resets
Shadow Assault
possibleConcerningAbilities: Noxian Diplomacy's stab  resets Talon's basic attack timer.  Shadow Assault can be cast during the dash.

0.text: Active: Talon throws a fan of daggers in a cone in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Talon throws a fan of daggers in a cone in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit.

1.text: At maximum range, the daggers linger for 0.75 seconds before homing back to Talon, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and  slowing them for 1 second.
1.html: At maximum range, the daggers linger for 0.75 seconds before homing back to Talon, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and slowing them for 1 second.
markedPassages: slowing

2.html: Rake deals 105% damage against monsters.
markedPassages: monsters

3.text: Enemies can be hit only once per pass.
3.html: Enemies can be hit only once per pass.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Enemies can be hit only once per pass.

0.text: Active: Talon  dashes up to 800 units over the target area of terrain, during which he gains  unobstructed vision.
0.html: Active: Talon dashes up to 800 units over the target area of terrain, during which he gains unobstructed vision.
markedPassages: dashes
unobstructed vision

1.text: Talon cannot cast Assassin's Path on the same area of terrain for a set duration.
1.html: Talon cannot cast Assassin's Path on the same area of terrain for a set duration.

2.text: Shadow Assault can be cast during the dash.
2.html: Shadow Assault can be cast during the dash.
markedPassages: Shadow Assault
possibleConcerningAbilities: Shadow Assault can be cast during the dash.

0.text: Active: Talon disperses a ring of blades around him that deals physical damage to nearby enemies, and gains  invisibility and  bonus movement speed for up to 2.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Talon disperses a ring of blades around him that deals physical damage to nearby enemies, and gains invisibility and  bonus movement speed for up to 2.5 seconds.
markedPassages: invisibility
bonus movement speed

1.text: Shadow Assault can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration or if Talon emerges from invisibility.
1.html: Shadow Assault can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration or if Talon emerges from invisibility.

2.text: Recast: Talon ends Shadow Assault, breaking the invisibility and causing the blades to converge to him, dealing the same damage to enemies hit. Breaking invisibility with a basic attack or  Noxian Diplomacy causes the blades to converge to the target instead.
2.html: Recast: Talon ends Shadow Assault, breaking the invisibility and causing the blades to converge to him, dealing the same damage to enemies hit. Breaking invisibility with a basic attack or Noxian Diplomacy causes the blades to converge to the target instead.
markedPassages: Noxian Diplomacy
